content: In the context of active listening, what word when emphasized can convey a deeper understanding and empathy towards the speaker in the following sentence: "His words were important, but what he really needed was for someone to ___." Fill in the blank to complete the sentence.

In the context of active listening, the word "listen" when emphasized can convey a deeper understanding and empathy towards the speaker. So, the completed sentence would be: "His words were important, but what he really needed was for someone to listen."
